bachapan se har ek mard unka fayda uthane k lie taiyar baitha hota hai

h jinko roj ye sb sahan krna padta

text:
rape victims to victim hoti hai tab bhi sabse pehle usko uske maa, baap, bhai,
rishtedaar, padosi taane maar maar ke maar dalte hain. pehle to vo complaint
karti he nahi aur agar kar de to court me beizzat ho, aadmi ko to koi bolta he
nai kuch. koi na beta koi na jab aurat itne saalon se tumhare zulm seh rahi
hai thoda tum logon ne seh liya to koi badi baat naa hai. pata ni jitni
begunaah airten aadmiyon ke zulm sehti aayi hain, thoda tum bhi seh lo. jaise
ko taisa kabhi na kabhi to milna he tha. i salute to those women jo aaiyon ka
shikaar karti hain. good job done.
label: CAG
text_pp: rape victims to victim hoti hai tab bhi sabse pehle usko uske maa , baap , bhai , rishtedaar , padosi taane maar maar ke maar dalte hain . pehle to vo complaint karti he nahi aur agar kar de to court me beizzat ho , aadmi ko to koi bolta he nai kuch . koi na beta koi na jab aurat itne saalon se tumhare zulm seh rahi hai thoda tum logon ne seh liya to koi badi baat naa hai . pata ni jitni begunaah airten aadmiyon ke zulm sehti aayi hain , thoda tum bhi seh lo . jaise ko taisa kabhi na kabhi to milna he tha . i salute to those women jo aaiyon ka shikaar karti hain . good job done .

text:
guys i also want to share something...mai pichle sal lalbaug gya tha ganpati
ka bahot passion h to mai sari ganpatiyo ki pictures le raha tha ek lady
bhaddi si facevali fast fast aa rahi thi usko mera pair lag gya kyuli mai
photo kheechte hue piche backstep liya to usko mera ek pair laga usne muje
apne mobile ke angle se aankh me mara mera aakh ke niche laga aur bahot blood
nikal raha tha...muje samjh nai aaya mai situation ko kaise handle karu par
phir b mai uske piche piche gya aur raste me jitne police vale the sbko bola
but sb muje bhaga diya..uska bad muje 5 se 6 police ke bad muje lady police
mili maine vo bhaddi aurat ka bag pakda hua tha kyuki vo bhag rahi thi aur
lady police ko pura bataya aur questioning me lady police ko b pata chal gya
galti kiski h phir usne bola wait karo saheb aa rahe h saheb aaye us bhaddi
aurat ne bola muje isne kamar pe hath lagaya us police vale ne mujse kuch
poocha b nai halaki mai cute sa 21 age ka hu par pata nai police vale ko mujme
wahsi ya havsi dikh raha tha usne mera color pakad liya aur bolne laga thane
chal itne me vo gandi shakal vali aurat nikal gyi phir 1 mint bad us lady
police ne use samjhaya police vale ko to usne police ne bola beta jaan bhoojh
ke maine aisa kiya nai to tuje vo phasa deti police station me aur tu hi
phasta last me dekha kaisa palti mari isliye aur usne kaha muje starting se
pata tha teri galti nai h.  
uske bad maine chilla chilla kar police valo ko bahot sunaya gusse me but meri
izzat ki laude lag chuke the.  
edited :- (usko bad me doobdhne nikala tha gusse me socha patthar mar ke sir
phod deta hu but crowd ke wajah se mili nai..aur next day ye b soch raha tha
agle din jau aur cctv phootage nikalvau but himmat nai hui ab mai itna dar gya
hu ki unknown ladkiyo se bat tak nai karta hu.)

text_pp: guys i also want to share something .. mai pichle sal lalbaug gya tha ganpati ka bahot passion h to mai sari ganpatiyo ki pictures le raha tha ek lady bhaddi si facevali fast fast aa rahi thi usko mera pair lag gya kyuli mai photo kheechte hue piche backstep liya to usko mera ek pair laga usne muje apne mobile ke angle se aankh me mara mera aakh ke niche laga aur bahot blood nikal raha tha .. muje samjh nai aaya mai situation ko kaise handle karu par phir b mai uske piche piche gya aur raste me jitne police vale the sbko bola but sb muje bhaga diya .. uska bad muje 5 se 6 police ke bad muje lady police mili maine vo bhaddi aurat ka bag pakda hua tha kyuki vo bhag rahi thi aur lady police ko pura bataya aur questioning me lady police ko b pata chal gya galti kiski h phir usne bola wait karo saheb aa rahe h saheb aaye us bhaddi aurat ne bola muje isne kamar pe hath lagaya us police vale ne mujse kuch poocha b nai halaki mai cute sa 21 age ka hu par pata nai police vale ko mujme wahsi ya havsi dikh raha tha usne mera color pakad liya aur bolne laga thane chal itne me vo gandi shakal vali aurat nikal gyi phir 1 mint bad us lady police ne use samjhaya police vale ko to usne police ne bola beta jaan bhoojh ke maine aisa kiya nai to tuje vo phasa deti police station me aur tu hi phasta last me dekha kaisa palti mari isliye aur usne kaha muje starting se pata tha teri galti nai h . uske bad maine chilla chilla kar police valo ko bahot sunaya gusse me but meri izzat ki laude lag chuke the . edited  : -  ( usko bad me doobdhne nikala tha gusse me socha patthar mar ke sir phod deta hu but crowd ke wajah se mili nai .. aur next day ye b soch raha tha agle din jau aur cctv phootage nikalvau but himmat nai hui ab mai itna dar gya hu ki unknown ladkiyo se bat tak nai karta hu .)

stand for equality people. stop misusing a law that's there to protect you and
not harm others... sirf ek nahi apitu kayi level pe life barbaad hoti hai.  
1) who ladka jis bechaare pe jhoota case dala.  
2) uski family  
3) asli mein jo vastavik ghunegaar hain
([#unnao](http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%23unnao)) woh bacch
nikalte hain.  
4) waise itne stigmas hai, isse sirf jo real victim or peedita aur peedit hain
unke liye mushkile aur badh jati hain.  
bhagwaan ke naate, insaniyat ke naate yeh insanity band karo.  
ladka ho ya ladki sabko nyaaye tatha insaaf ka haq hai.

vaapis aane main let ho gayi thi. to ghar vaale dhundne lage the usko. baccho ne bataaya ki
wo us vaali gali main uske saath khud gaadi main baithkar gayi he hamane dekha tha. ye to hamane
bhi dekha tha ki wo khudd hi maaruti car main baithkar gayi thi ham tab chote bachche the. ye
baat fail gayi thi. jab ladki vaapis aayi to gharavaalon ne rape kii baat kah di. medical main
pruf ho gaya ki sex kiya he. wo ladkaa jail gaya ladke ke baap kii kuch din main maut
ho gayi. ladki ke ghar vaale kuch maheene baad hi duusare shahar chale gaye. lekin ladke kii
jindagi barbaad ho gayi. jhooth cese tha ye rape kaa. sabhi jaanate hai iske bare main.

ye sab! so called indian film industry ki galti! hai!  
wha..to bs aise show krte hn agar koi ladki nhi maani! haath dho ke uske
peeche lag jao! fir wo zarrur maane gi! + jab aisa kuch real life m hota hn
then ye so called celebrities media m aake saamne waale ke favor m stand lete
h!  
e.g sonam kapoor!  
baaki yr! jo tum dekhte ho whi tum krte ho! tum isko manno ya na mano!  
  
and yr!  
respect hamesha kisi particular gender ko mt do!  
respect hamesha human ko do!  
nor male nor female!  
only humanity!  
jha agar ladka koi galt kaam krta h! usse hm slap krte h!  
whi agar ladki koi galat kam karti h! to usse bhi slap krro!  
warning deke jaane mt do!  
yhi sabse baddi galti h!  
and second isme haath h! hamare schools ka! wha! to badda equality equality
bolte hn but jb real m baat aati h! to choro! aap ko to patta hi hoga!  
  
and third hm! ... humari galti h!

text:
absolutely right, jis mudde pe ye film bani h, ye bilkul sahi mudda h, humare
desh me ladkiyo k saath bahut annaye, hota h, rape hote h, bahut tarha se
peedit ki jaaty h ladkiya, par usi jagha ladkiya bhi bahut tarha se ladko ko
peedit karty, unpe jhoote charges laga k, jhoote case laga k, law ka galat
fayada uthaty h, humara law humari protection k liye banaya gya h, justic k
liye banaya gya h, na ki galat tarha se use karne k liye, ladke agar rapist
hote h aur ese ladko ko saja milni chaheye jo ladkiyo ki izzat ni karte par
ladkiyo ko bhi jhoote case me ladko ko nahi fasana chahaye, koi agar bekasoor
h to uski zindigi ko is tarha se tabha karne ka unhe koi haq ni h, meri
request h un ladkiyo se jo ek admi ki izzat ko is tarha rond dety h unpe
jhoote case laga k unki puri zindigi tabha kar dety h , aur meri request h un
ladko se bhi jo ladkiyo ko apni per ki jooty samajhte h rape karte h koi izzat
ni samajhte h aur ubki bhi izzat ronde h apne pero tale, plzzzz respect to man
and woman both , apne karma ache karo, uper wala dekh raha h. jo karoge bahi
back milega.

text_pp: absolutely right , jis mudde pe ye film bani h , ye bilkul sahi mudda h , humare desh me ladkiyo k saath bahut annaye , hota h , rape hote h , bahut tarha se peedit ki jaaty h ladkiya , par usi jagha ladkiya bhi bahut tarha se ladko ko peedit karty , unpe jhoote charges laga k , jhoote case laga k , law ka galat fayada uthaty h , humara law humari protection k liye banaya gya h , justic k liye banaya gya h , na ki galat tarha se use karne k liye , ladke agar rapist hote h aur ese ladko ko saja milni chaheye jo ladkiyo ki izzat ni karte par ladkiyo ko bhi jhoote case me ladko ko nahi fasana chahaye , koi agar bekasoor h to uski zindigi ko is tarha se tabha karne ka unhe koi haq ni h , meri request h un ladkiyo se jo ek admi ki izzat ko is tarha rond dety h unpe jhoote case laga k unki puri zindigi tabha kar dety h  , aur meri request h un ladko se bhi jo ladkiyo ko apni per ki jooty samajhte h rape karte h koi izzat ni samajhte h aur ubki bhi izzat ronde h apne pero tale , plzz respect to man and woman both  , apne karma ache karo , uper wala dekh raha h . jo karoge bahi back milega .

text:
main khud bhi iskaa shikaar hum, 2018 main main bhi jhuthe aarope main 5 maheene kii sazaa kaati
he . abhi bhi cese chal rahaa he..jail bhari padi hai in jhuthe keson se .. balig ladki ko
naaballig bataa kar cese darj karavaate hai 5-5 saal sunwaayee nahi he ... pocso cese main
bail nahi mil rahi, andar hi andar sazaa ho jaati he . maine jo dekha he uske aadhaar par
kah saktaa hoon ki sirf 5% cese sach hai baaki sab jhuthe cese hai . ladkiyaan apni marzi
se ghar se bhaagti hai, sambandh banaati hai jab pakadi jaati hai to ghar waalon ke dabaav main
jhuthe cese darj karwaati hai .. badale kii bhaavana se paisa luutane ke bahaane se jhuthe cese
darj karwaati hai . kai ladke to 5/10/15 lakh dekar compromise karke nikle hai . mere
khud ke cese main ladki ke saath mere sambandh 6 saal se the par uske gharavaalon ko jab pataa
chalaa to ladki ko mere khilaaf karne ke liye uski maa ne bhi aarope lagaaya ki mere saath
bhi rape kiya he . 2.5 karod kaa lut kaa maamla bhi darj kara diya ki tantra mantra puja
paath ke naam se 2.5 karod rupee anth liye 3 kilo sona le liya . achche se achche dhani
seth bhi ghar main 3 kilo sona nahi rakhte or 2.5 karod kii puja nahi karavaate .... is sab
main police ne bhi unka saath diya ... apane rasookh ke dam par thane main report na kara kar
sidhe sog main maamla darj karavaaya jabaki ye sog kaa cese hi nahi hota . mujhe itnaa
torchar karavaaya jisaki koi kalpana bhi nahi kar saktaa ... unka makasad tha mujhe 10-20 saal
ke liye andar karvaa dena or jisaki unhone puri koshish bhi kii .... par bhagwaan mere
saath tha ki bel mil gai or mujhe yakeen he ki court main wo parivaar jhootha sabit hoga
... par meri zindagi to kharaab ho gai meraa sara vyapaar khatm ho gaya ... meri itani
badanaami hui jisaki koi had nahi ... paisa dekar unhone akhabaaron main aise aise jhooth
bole or chhapavaye hai ki kya bataaun .... jhuthe cese darj hone kaa sabase bada kaaran ye
bhi he ki ladki kii identity chhupai jaati he ... unako pataa hota he ham logon ke naam
pate to akhbaar main aayenge nahi isaliye bekhauf rahati hai .... yaa to jab tak ladkaa doshi
sabit na ho jaye tab tak ladke kii identity chhupai jaani chaiye . yaa donon kii
saarvajanik honi chaiye ...agar aisa ho jaye to 70-80% cese darj hi nahi honge .
doosraa ksharan ye he ki cese ke baad agar ladke ke paksh main faisla jaataa he to ladkaa
manahani kaa cese ladki or uske parivaar par nahi kar saktaa kyonki ladke ko andeh yaa
sabooton ke abhaav main bari kiya jaataa he jiske kaaran ladkaa manahani kaa cese nahi karata
agar ye kanoon ban jaye ki ladki juthi sabit hui to usko bhi utani sazaa milegi to 90%
cese to darj hi nahi honge . 6-7 saal jail main rahane ke baad agar ladkaa bari bhi ho jaataa
he to kya phayda ? uski jindagi to kharaab ho gai na ? maine kai cese aise dekhe hai ki
jisamen agar ladkaa doshi sabit hota he to use 10 saal kii sazaa honi hoti he par 7-8
saal baad ladkaa jail main rahakar agar bari ho gaya to bhi puri sazaa to usne kaat lee ... phir
bari kaa kya matlab rah jaayegaa ? ladki to aarope laga kar ghar baith jaati he uski duniya
main to koi fark nahi padataa ... ladkaa bechaara or uskaa parivaar mare sirf isaliye kii
usne ladki se pyaar kiya ? yaa to cese lagane ke saath bel kaa praavdhaan ho phir jo bhi
doshi sabit ho usko sazaa mili par aisa hindustan main kuch bhi sambhav nahi he . yahaan
kanoon hi lachar he police bhrasht he to aam aadmi to sirf mar hi saktaa he .

mujhe itnaa torchar karavaaya jisaki koi kalpana bhi nahi kar saktaa  .. unka makasad tha mujhe 10-20 saal ke liye andar karvaa dena or jisaki unhone puri koshish bhi kii  .. par bhagwaan mere saath indian judiciary ke loopholes ko highlight karne ke liye kisi na kisiko apni
life khoni padti hai. jab nirbhaya case hua tab inn kale coat wale haramiyo ke
dimag me baat aayi ki ek 17 saal ka ladka bhi rape kar sakta hai. aur jab
sarabjit wala case hua tab ja kar baat samjh aayi ki ladki jhoot bhi bol sakti
hai. problem yeh hai ki hum ek bohot hi 3rd class system ke gulam hai.

most of the rape cases are false.. it is rightly said in the documentary that
when the two lovers get caught by their families it becomes rape case.. and
how dumb is our constitution that they will arrest any man just on words said
by a women what if he will found not guilty after the imprisonment of months
akd years. how he will remove the blot of rapist how he will survive his next
life indirect form of guilt without being guilty ? what about the precious
time of his career miserably spend behind the lockup and in courts ? and what
about the torture of jail and the money he have to give to judges lawyers
policemen etc. by innocent family memebers ? isse acha to maar hi do bhai
zinda bhi q rakhte ho sidhe death sentence sunao ? rape hua hai ya nahi kisne
kiya hai kisne nahi ye pata lagane me court helpless hai to bhai uski saza ik
admi ko kyu di jaye..?  
shadi baad bhi ajkal ye niyam nikal gaya hai ki admi ko biwi se puchh ke sex
karna hoga to some extent its understanding between the two.. but the irony is
shadi baad bhi biwi rape case kar sakti hai.. what the hell kya niyam bana
rahe ho tum log kya nashe me beth ke banaye kya are wo bhi karo lekin sasta
nasha karke judges ye niyam kyu banaye? ab hmare pas to ik hi rasta hai live
in me raho mast raho ..

text:
bhai kam se kam 50-60 virgin ladki ka rape karo, kam se kam maja to aayega, 5
saal agar jail me rahoge bhi to virgin chut phadne k maja police ka danda ka
dard bhula dega, sala bahut phasa rahi ye log ladke logon ko, law ka misuse
kar rahi hai. sambhal jao ladies kahin law uth gaya hum logon ke protest se to
tum logon ka shikaar hoga sirf, yaad rakho ye govt. mard hi chalata hai,
tumhari koi aukaat nahi hai, chut se nikli ho chut me lawda logi bas ye
tumhara kaam hai. feminism me laude lag jayenge. hum agar aurton ko udne ka
mauka dete hain to uske upar se asmaan bhi hata lene ki taqat rakhte hain.

puche aur roz field me ja kar maaze kare usko tu 'preeti samjhti hai kabir ko'
bolega?

reverse kar le ki koi ladki aa k bina puche kiss kar le and knife dikha kar
bole kapde utar. public seeti maregi kya uspe?
